document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Alysia Latreille (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), with description of six new species from China

figureCitation.captionText-0: FIGURE 23. Alysia sirin Belokobylskij, ♀, China (Shaanxi), habitus, lateral aspect.
figureCitation.captionText-1: FIGURE 24. Alysia sirin Belokobylskij, ♀, China (Shaanxi), A, wing; B, mesosoma, lateral aspect; C, mesosoma, dorsal aspect; D, propodeum, first and second metasomal tergites, dorsal aspect; E, propodeum and metasoma, dorsal aspect; F, basal segments of antenna, lateral aspect; G, antenna, lateral aspect; H, ovipositor and ovipositor sheath, lateral aspect; I, head, dorsal aspect; J, head, anterior aspect; K, head, lateral aspect; L, mandible, full view on first and second teeth; M, mandible, full view on third tooth N, hind leg, lateral aspect.
